    • allAppt

      public static void allAppt() throws SQLException
      lambda expression is used here. A lambda is used in order to convert my Zoned Date Time objects into Time and Date strings to be displayed in my appointment table. populates the list of appointments without filters
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a sql error

    • monthAppt

      public static void monthAppt() throws SQLException
      lambda expression used here. A lambda is used here on a ArrayList of ZonedDateTime objects to convert them to Strings in order to save them in an Appointment class to be displayed in the future. populates the list of appintments and filters by current month
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a sql error

    • weekAppt
